scripts.pack: azde-scripts build src/tasks && azde-scripts package src/tasks && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file config/release.json
scripts.packupversion: azde-scripts build src/tasks && azde-scripts package && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version --overrides-file config/release.json
scripts.pack:dev: azde-scripts build src/tasks && azde-scripts package src/tasks && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file config/dev.json
scripts.packupversion:dev: npm run build && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version --overrides-file config/dev.json
